text: Charithra Surya Chandran (born 17 January 1997) is a British actress. She is best known for her role as Edwina Sharma in season two of the Netflix series Bridgerton and her role in the science fiction series Alex Rider. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Scottish actors Category:1997 births Category:People from Perth, Scotland
title: Charithra Chandran
